Trigger.name: Forging started
Trigger.script: forging = true if #forge.next > 0 then table.remove(forge.next, 1) end

regexCodeList.string: You place the required materials in the forge, beginning to heat them to the necessary temperature.

Trigger.name: Forging finished
Trigger.script:
forging = false
if matches[2] == "full plate" then forgeItem = "fullplate" else forgeItem = matches[2] end enableTrigger("Forging Balance")

regexCodeList.string: ^With a final strike of the hammer, you finish forging the (.*)\.$

Trigger.name: Forging Balance
Trigger.script:
if forgePause ~= true then if anvil == true and forgeWhat == "anvil" then if #forge.next > 0 then sendAll("place anvil", "get "..forgeItem.." from "..forgeWhat, "forge for "..forge.next[1]) disableTrigger("Forging Balance") else sendAll("place anvil", "get "..forgeItem.." from "..forgeWhat) disableTrigger("Forging Balance") for _, v in pairs(forge.comms) do forge.comms[_] = 0 end end end
if anvil ~= true then if #forge.next > 0 then sendAll("get "..forgeItem.." from "..forgeWhat, "forge for "..forge.next[1]) disableTrigger("Forging Balance") else send("get "..forgeItem.." from "..forgeWhat) disableTrigger("Forging Balance") for _, v in pairs(forge.comms) do forge.comms[_] = 0 end end end elseif forgePause == true then send("get "..forgeItem.." from "..forgeWhat) end

regexCodeList.string: You have recovered balance on all limbs.
You lay down your hammer and cease working on your creation.

Trigger.name: Forge Again

regexCodeList.string: You have recovered balance on all limbs.
You set A portable anvil down.

Trigger.name: Forge EQ
Trigger.script: if forgeEQ == false then if anvil ~= true and forgeWhat == "anvil" then sendAll("place anvil", "outr coal", "put coal in "..forgeWhat, "fire forge") svo.defs.keepup("selfishness", true) else sendAll("outr coal", "put coal in "..forgeWhat, "fire forge") svo.defs.keepup("selfishness", true) end enableTrigger("Forge Selfishness") elseif forgeEQ == true then send("forge for "..forge.next[1]) forgeEQ = false end disableTrigger("Forge EQ")
